Uses of Class
it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j.FTPException

  • Packages that use FTPException 
    Package Description
    it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j
    FTP client implementation

    • Uses of FTPException in it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j

      Methods in it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j that throw FTPException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FTPClient.append(File file)
      This method appends the contents of a local file to an existing file on the remote server.
      void FTPClient.append(File file, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method uploads a file to the remote server.
      void FTPClient.append(String fileName, InputStream inputStream, long streamOffset, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method appends data to an existing file on the remote server.
      void FTPClient.changeAccount(String account)
      Call this method to switch the user current account.
      void FTPClient.changeDirectory(String path)
      This method changes the current working directory.
      void FTPClient.changeDirectoryUp()
      This method changes the current working directory to the parent one.
      String[] FTPClient.connect(String host)
      This method connects the client to the remote FTP host, using the default port value 21 (990 if security level is set to FTPS, see FTPClient.setSecurity(int)).
      String[] FTPClient.connect(String host, int port)
      This method connects the client to the remote FTP host.
      void FTPClient.createDirectory(String directoryName)
      This method creates a new remote directory in the current working one.
      String FTPClient.currentDirectory()
      This method asks and returns the current working directory.
      void FTPClient.deleteDirectory(String path)
      This method deletes a remote directory.
      void FTPClient.deleteFile(String path)
      This method deletes a remote file.
      void FTPClient.disconnect(boolean sendQuitCommand)
      This method disconnects from the remote server, optionally performing the QUIT procedure.
      void FTPClient.download(String remoteFileName, File localFile)
      This method downloads a remote file from the server to a local file.
      void FTPClient.download(String remoteFileName, File localFile, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method downloads a remote file from the server to a local file.
      void FTPClient.download(String remoteFileName, File localFile, long restartAt)
      This method resumes a download operation from the remote server to a local file.
      void FTPClient.download(String remoteFileName, File localFile, long restartAt, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method resumes a download operation from the remote server to a local file.
      void FTPClient.download(String fileName, OutputStream outputStream, long restartAt, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method resumes a download operation from the remote server.
      long FTPClient.fileSize(String path)
      This method asks and returns a file size in bytes.
      String[] FTPClient.help()
      This method calls the HELP command on the remote server, returning a list of lines with the help contents.
      FTPFile[] FTPClient.list()
      This method lists the entries of the current working directory parsing the reply to a FTP LIST command.
      FTPFile[] FTPClient.list(String fileSpec)
      This method lists the entries of the current working directory parsing the reply to a FTP LIST command.
      String[] FTPClient.listNames()
      This method lists the entries of the current working directory with a FTP NLST command.
      void FTPClient.login(String username, String password)
      This method authenticates the user against the server.
      void FTPClient.login(String username, String password, String account)
      This method authenticates the user against the server.
      void FTPClient.logout()
      This method performs a logout operation for the current user, leaving the connection open, thus it can be used to start a new user session.
      Date FTPClient.modifiedDate(String path)
      This method asks and returns the last modification date of a file or directory.
      void FTPClient.noop()
      This method performs a "noop" operation with the server.
      void FTPClient.rename(String oldPath, String newPath)
      This method renames a remote file or directory.
      String[] FTPClient.serverStatus()
      This method returns the remote server status, as the result of a FTP STAT command.
      void FTPClient.upload(File file)
      This method uploads a file to the remote server.
      void FTPClient.upload(File file, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method uploads a file to the remote server.
      void FTPClient.upload(File file, long restartAt)
      This method uploads a file to the remote server.
      void FTPClient.upload(File file, long restartAt, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method uploads a file to the remote server.
      void FTPClient.upload(String fileName, InputStream inputStream, long restartAt, long streamOffset, FTPDataTransferListener listener)
      This method uploads a content to the remote server.
